entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
